message_1:
What is the median of the following dataset?
35, 48, 21, 57, 49, 26, 50, 32, 62, 44
message_2:
To find the median, we first need to arrange the dataset in ascending order:

21, 26, 32, 35, 44, 48, 49, 50, 57, 62

Since there are 10 numbers in the dataset (an even number), the median will be the average of the two middle numbers (the 5th and 6th numbers in this case):

(44 + 48) / 2 = 92 / 2 = 46

The median of the dataset is 46.
